individual_metadata.synopsis: Gale is not available for an OM, but player has clicked on Elminster. He doesn't have much to say to them.

0.speaker: Weary Traveller
0.text: Even less to be said than before, friend. Don't allow me to eat up your time.

1.speaker: Weary Traveller
1.text: Have a care, friend. I'm but a weary traveller, foot-sore and short-of-breath. I'll spare you my puffing and keep my counsel for now.
